Class ACAQIteratingAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.algorithm.ACAQAlgorithm
      • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.algorithm.ACAQIteratingAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQValidatable, ACAQParameterCollection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoThresholdSegmenter, BioformatsImporter, BrightSpotsSegmenter, CLAHEImageEnhancer, FileAnnotationGenerator, FilterFiles, FilterFolders, FolderAnnotationGenerator, GenerateColumnAlgorithm, HessianSegmenter, HoughSegmenter, IlluminationCorrectionEnhancer, ImageJ1Algorithm, ImageJ2AlgorithmWrapper, ImagePlusFromFile, InternalGradientSegmenter, ListFiles, ListSubfolders, MacroWrapperAlgorithm, MaskToParticleConverter, MergeROIEnhancer, MultiChannelSplitterConverter, NavigateSubFolder, RemoveColumnAlgorithm, RenameColumnAlgorithm, ResultsTableFromFile, ROIDataFromFile, StackInverterAlgorithm, WatershedMaskEnhancer

    public abstract class ACAQIteratingAlgorithm
extends ACAQAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that iterates through each data row This algorithm type makes sure that input slots are always matched, otherwise errors are thrown

        Description copied from class: ACAQAlgorithm
        Runs the workload
        Specified by:
        run in class ACAQAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        subProgress - allows algorithms to report sub-progress
        algorithmProgress - call to provide sub-progress
        isCancelled - returns if cancellation was requested

      • runIteration

        protected abstract void runIteration(ACAQDataInterface dataInterface,
                                     ACAQRunnerSubStatus subProgress,
                                     Consumer<ACAQRunnerSubStatus> algorithmProgress,
                                     Supplier<Boolean> isCancelled)
        Runs code on one data row
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - The data interface
        subProgress - The current sub-progress this algorithm is scheduled in
        algorithmProgress - Consumer to publish a new sub-progress
        isCancelled - Supplier that informs if the current task was canceled
